verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) - [ARG0: The White House] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [V: defended] [ARG1: President Donald Trump 's decision to return a military salute to a North Korean three - star general] .
WASHINGTON ( AP ) - The White House on Thursday defended President Donald Trump 's decision to [V: return] [ARG1: a military salute] [ARG2: to a North Korean three - star general] .
